casebody.data:
483 A.2d 348 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. James Evans BENTLEY. Misc. (Subtitle BV), No. 18,

September Term, 1984.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Nov. 2, 1984.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment filed by James Evans Bentley in accordance with Maryland Rule *439BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 2nd day of November, 1984,

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that James Evans Bentley be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of James Evans Bentley from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
